Rule Detail: TAS components: The combination of all the elements that make up the TAS must match the Treasury Central Accounting Reporting System (CARS). AgencyIdentifier, MainAccountCode, and SubAccountCode are always required. AllocationTransferAgencyIdentifier, BeginningPeriodOfAvailability, EndingPeriodOfAvailability and AvailabilityTypeCode are required if present in the CARS table.
Comments: Need some process for keeping TAS file up to date

Rule Detail: BudgetAuthorityAvailableAmountTotal_CPE = BudgetAuthorityAppropriatedAmount_CPE + BudgetAuthorityUnobligatedBalanceBroughtForward_FYB + AdjustmentsToUnobligatedBalanceBroughtForward_CPE + OtherBudgetaryResourcesAmount_CPE
OtherBudgetaryResourcesAmount_CPE = ContractAuthorityAmountTotal_CPE + BorrowingAuthorityAmountTotal_CPE + SpendingAuthorityfromOffsettingCollectionsAmountTotal_CPE
StatusOfBudgetaryResourcesTotal_CPE= ObligationsIncurredTotalByTAS_CPE + UnobligatedBalance_CPE
BudgetAuthorityAvailableAmountTotal_CPE= CPE value for GTAS SF 133 line #1910
BudgetAuthorityUnobligatedBalanceBroughtForward_FYB= value for GTAS SF 133 line #1000
BudgetAuthorityAppropriatedAmount_CPE= CPE aggregate value for GTAS SF 133 line #1160 + #1180 + #1260 + #1280
ContractAuthorityAmountTotal_CPE= CPE aggregate value for GTAS SF 133 line #1540 + #1640
BorrowingAuthorityAmountTotal_CPE= CPE aggregate value for GTAS SF 133 line #1340 + #1440
SpendingAuthorityfromOffsettingCollectionsAmountTotal_CPE= CPE aggregate value for GTAS SF 133 line #1750 + #1850
AdjustmentsToUnobligatedBalanceBroughtForward_CPE= CPE aggregate value for GTAS SF 133 line #1010-1042
GrossOutlayAmountByTAS_CPE= CPE value for GTAS SF 133 line #3020
UnobligatedBalance_CPE= CPE value for GTAS SF 133 line #2490
All the elements that have FYB in file A, B & C would be expected in quarter 1, as a soft edit. It would be optional in subsequent periods.
Comments: Set of fields required if applicable to Q1

Rule Detail: Submitted value must match corresponding GTAS value (see specific rule)

GrossOutlayAmountByTAS_CPE (file A) = sum of all GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass (file B) {When not disaggregated by Program Activity and Object Class, this value is the sum of all Gross Outlay Amounts reported in file B, by TAS/Subaccount}
ObligationsIncurredTotalByTAS_CPE (File A) = sum of ObligationsIncurredByProgramObjectClass_CPE (File B)
Comments: Is this summed by TAS like A18?

Rule Detail: Must be valid Agency ID in the Common Government-wide Accounting Classification (CGAC)
Comments: Is this in domain values file?

Rule Detail: Only acceptable values are x and [blank]
Comments: Implemented as IN_SET because of earlier version

Rule Detail: ObligationsIncurredTotaByTAS_CPE= CPE value for GTAS SF 133 line #2190
StatusOfBudgetaryResourcesTotal_CPE= CPE value for GTAS SF 133 line #2500
StatusOfBudgetaryResourcesTotal_CPE = BudgetAuthorityAvailableAmountTotal_CPE
BorrowingAuthorityAmountTotal_CPE must be provided if TAS has borrowing authority per CARS or GTAS. If no borrowing authority on TAS, leave blank.
Comments: What does it mean to have borrowing authority?

Rule Detail: ContractAuthorityAmountTotal_CPE must be provided if TAS has contract authority per CARS or GTAS. If no contract authority on TAS, leave blank.
Comments: What does it mean to have contract authority?

Rule Detail: SpendingAuthorityfromOffsettingCollectionsAmountTotal_CPE must be provided if TAS has spending authority per CARS or GTAS. If no spending authority on TAS, leave blank.
Comments: What does it mean to have spending authority?

Rule Detail: OtherBudgetaryResourcesAmount_CPE must be provided if TAS has borrowing, contract or spending authority per CARS or GTAS. If not applicable, leave blank.
ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4801 + 4831 + 4871 + 4881). This applies to the program activity and object class level.
ObligationsDeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4901 + 4931 + 4971 + 4981). This applies to the program activity and object class level.
GrossOutlayAmountByProgramObjectClass (FYB or CPE, File B) = GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB or CPE, File B) + GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB or CPE, File B)
GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4802 + 4832 + 4872+ 4882). This applies to the program activity and object class level.
GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB or CPE)= USSGL(4902 + 4908 + 4972 + 4982). This applies to the program activity and object class level.
Must be a valid program activity name for the corresponding TAS/TAFS as defined in Section 82 of OMB Circular A-11.
Comments: Is this in domain values file?

Rule Detail: Must be a valid program activity code for the corresponding TAS/TAFS as defined in Section 82 of OMB Circular A-11.
Comments: Is this in domain values file?

Rule Detail: Must be valid 3-digit object class as defined in OMB Circular A-11 Section 83.6, or a 4-digit code which includes a 1-digit prefix that distinguishes direct, reimbursable, and allocation obligations. Do not include decimal points when reporting in the Schema.
Comments: Is this in domain values file?  What are the valid prefixes?

Rule Detail: Reimbursable flag indicator is required when reporting obligation or outlay USSGL account balances (excluding downward adjustments SGL accounts). Valid values are "R" for "ReimbursableFundingSource" and "D" for "DirectFundingSource".
Comments: Unclear what the condition is, this check is currently applied to all records

Rule Detail: DeobligationsRecoveriesRefundsdOfPriorYearByProgramObjectClass_CPE = USSGL(4871+ 4872 + 4971 + 4972)
ObligationsUndeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4801 + 4831 + 4871 + 4881). This applies to the award level.
ObligationsDeliveredOrdersUnpaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4901 + 4931 + 4971 + 4981). This applies to the award level.
GrossOutlayAmountByAward (FYB or CPE, File C) = GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB or CPE, File C) + GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB or CPE, File C)
GrossOutlaysUndeliveredOrdersPrepaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4802 + 4832 + 4872+ 4882). This applies to the award level.
GrossOutlaysDeliveredOrdersPaidTotal (FYB or CPE) = USSGL(4902 + 4908 + 4972 + 4982). This applies to the award level.
Unique FAIN/URI from file C exists in file D2
Unique FAIN/URI from file D2 exists in file C, except D2 records with zero FederalActionObligation
Unique PIID, ParentAwardId from file C exists in file D1
Unique PIID, ParentAwardId from file D1 exists in file C, except D1 records with zero FederalActionObligation
If FAIN is not provided then provide URI
Comments: Including PIID in this rule, one of the three must be present

Rule Detail: Not Required on rows that include values for USSGL accounts balances or subtotals
